name: CMY Color Strategy Implementation
description: Implement process for utilizing CMY color strategy and have a documented process for decision making to improve run speeds on HP and gain WIP rate efficiencies.

subtasks.name: CMY Color Calibration Audit
subtasks.description: Conduct CMY color calibration audit and document current HP press color profiles across all substrate types
subtasks.completion_criteria: Completed audit report with baseline color profiles for minimum 10 substrate types; documented current run speed benchmarks per profile
subtasks.dependencies: Access to HP press during non-production hours; historical run data from past 6 months
subtasks.success_metric: 100% of active substrate profiles documented; baseline metrics established for comparison

subtasks.name: CMY Decision Matrix Development
subtasks.description: Develop and pilot CMY decision matrix with standardized workflows for color selection based on job specifications
subtasks.completion_criteria: Written SOP document approved by production team; decision flowchart created; pilot tested on minimum 20 production runs
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 1.1; input from sales on color-critical vs. standard jobs
subtasks.success_metric: Decision matrix reduces color selection time by 30%; pilot runs show minimum 10% improvement in setup time

subtasks.name: Production Staff Training & Tracking
subtasks.description: Train production staff on CMY protocol and implement tracking system for continuous improvement
subtasks.completion_criteria: All HP press operators (minimum 4 staff) trained and certified; tracking dashboard live in production reporting system
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 1.2; IT support for dashboard integration
subtasks.success_metric: 100% operator certification; weekly run speed data showing 15%+ improvement vs. Q4 2025 baseline

name: Premium White to Standard White Transition
description: Validate the ability to switch from Premium White to Standard White when running all print jobs. Standard White is included in Clicks while Premium White is an additional cost.

subtasks.name: Standard White Quality Validation
subtasks.description: Conduct quality validation testing of Standard White across all current job types and document color consistency results
subtasks.completion_criteria: Testing completed on minimum 15 representative job types; color delta-E measurements documented; customer-facing sample sets prepared for high-profile accounts
subtasks.dependencies: Standard White material samples from supplier; access to colorimeter/spectrophotometer
subtasks.success_metric: 90%+ of job types pass quality threshold (delta-E < 2.0); zero critical failures on brand-specific colors

subtasks.name: Inventory Transition Planning
subtasks.description: Develop inventory transition plan and coordinate with procurement to deplete Premium White stock while onboarding Standard White
subtasks.completion_criteria: Written transition plan with week-by-week inventory targets; Premium White inventory reduced to safety stock levels only; Standard White MOQ ordered and received
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 2.1 with acceptable results; current Premium White inventory audit
subtasks.success_metric: Premium White inventory reduced by 80%; Standard White stock levels at 4-week supply; zero stockouts during transition

subtasks.name: Full Production Cutover
subtasks.description: Execute full production cutover to Standard White and document cost savings realization
subtasks.completion_criteria: 100% of new production runs using Standard White; cost tracking report showing actual vs. projected savings; contingency protocol documented for edge cases
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 2.2; Finance support for cost tracking
subtasks.success_metric: Monthly material cost reduction achieved per projected Click savings; zero customer quality complaints related to transition

name: 30" Thermal Laminator Acquisition
description: Work with Print Rush to take on ownership of 30" China Thermal Laminator once they receive their Gonderflex. Build out Thermal Lamination redundancy in house and utilize equipment to laminate product printed by Growve.

subtasks.name: Equipment Transfer Negotiation
subtasks.description: Negotiate equipment transfer terms with Print Rush and conduct pre-transfer equipment inspection
subtasks.completion_criteria: Signed equipment transfer agreement; completed inspection report documenting machine condition, maintenance history, and required repairs; timeline confirmed for Gonderflex delivery to Print Rush
subtasks.dependencies: Print Rush confirmation of Gonderflex delivery schedule; access for equipment inspection
subtasks.success_metric: Agreement signed with favorable terms; equipment condition rated 7/10 or better; transfer date confirmed

subtasks.name: Facility Preparation
subtasks.description: Prepare facility for laminator installation including utilities, floor space, and material handling requirements
subtasks.completion_criteria: Installation site prepared and inspected; electrical/utility connections verified; material flow plan documented for integration with existing production
subtasks.dependencies: Equipment specifications from Print Rush; facilities team availability
subtasks.success_metric: Installation site passes pre-installation checklist; zero installation delays due to facility readiness

subtasks.name: Equipment Installation & Training
subtasks.description: Execute equipment transfer, installation, commissioning, and operator training
subtasks.completion_criteria: Equipment physically transferred and installed; successful test runs completed; minimum 2 operators trained and certified; integration with Growve print workflow documented
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtasks 3.1 and 3.2; Print Rush equipment release (tied to Gonderflex receipt)
subtasks.success_metric: Equipment operational within 2 weeks of transfer; first Growve-printed material laminated in-house by end of Q1

name: Growve Partnership as 30" Print Partner
description: Establish partnership with Growve as 30" print partner. Utilize 200k at Growve and material from Dazpak stored at Growve to minimize externally marked up midweb pricing. Lamination and Converting would be completed at Calyx.

subtasks.name: Partnership Agreement
subtasks.description: Establish formal partnership agreement with Growve including pricing, capacity commitments, and quality standards
subtasks.completion_criteria: Signed partnership agreement covering pricing tiers, volume commitments (200k MSI minimum), quality specifications, lead times, and material handling protocols for Dazpak-sourced substrate
subtasks.dependencies: Growve capacity confirmation; Dazpak material storage agreement at Growve
subtasks.success_metric: Agreement signed with pricing at minimum 15% below current external midweb rates; SLA for 5-day lead time on standard orders

subtasks.name: Integrated Workflow Development
subtasks.description: Develop integrated workflow for Growve-printed material receiving, lamination at Calyx, and quality checkpoints
subtasks.completion_criteria: Documented end-to-end workflow SOP; quality inspection checklist at receiving; scheduling integration between Growve production and Calyx lamination/converting capacity
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 4.1; Objective 3 progress (laminator availability)
subtasks.success_metric: Workflow SOP approved; pilot batch (minimum 5,000 MSI) processed through complete cycle with documented metrics

subtasks.name: Production Ramp-Up & Cost Validation
subtasks.description: Execute production ramp-up with Growve and validate cost savings vs. current external vendors
subtasks.completion_criteria: Minimum 50,000 MSI processed through Growve partnership in Q1; complete cost analysis comparing Growve/Calyx model vs. fully outsourced pricing
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 4.2; adequate material inventory at Growve
subtasks.success_metric: Demonstrated cost savings of minimum 20% vs. current external pricing; quality acceptance rate of 98%+

name: Dazpak Material Cost Optimization
description: Work with Dazpak to finalize lowest cost Material through sourcing and Group Buying strategies. Targeting a $0.30/MSI price point for White METPET and to have product stored on consignment at Growve.

subtasks.name: Pricing Negotiation with Dazpak
subtasks.description: Conduct formal pricing negotiation with Dazpak including volume commitments, group buying options, and consignment terms
subtasks.completion_criteria: Written proposal submitted to Dazpak with volume projections; formal response received with pricing tiers; preliminary agreement on consignment structure at Growve
subtasks.dependencies: 2026 volume forecasts finalized; Growve confirmation of storage capacity and consignment willingness
subtasks.success_metric: Negotiated pricing within 10% of $0.30/MSI target; consignment terms agreed in principle

subtasks.name: Supply Agreement Execution
subtasks.description: Finalize and execute supply agreement with Dazpak including consignment logistics at Growve
subtasks.completion_criteria: Signed supply agreement with Dazpak; consignment inventory management protocol documented; initial consignment stock delivered to Growve
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 5.1; Growve storage and handling agreement
subtasks.success_metric: Agreement signed at $0.30/MSI or better; minimum 30-day consignment stock established at Growve

subtasks.name: Inventory Tracking Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement inventory tracking and replenishment system for consignment material at Growve
subtasks.completion_criteria: Inventory visibility system live (shared spreadsheet or integration); automatic reorder triggers defined; monthly reconciliation process documented
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 5.2; IT/systems support for tracking implementation
subtasks.success_metric: Real-time inventory visibility achieved; zero stockouts; 30-day average inventory turn maintained

name: 26" Flexo Setup with Dazpak
description: Ensure that Dazpak can quote all of our standard prelams and laminates on their 26" Flexographic press. This allows lower barrier to entry for flexographic and the ability to do quicker changeovers for SKU variation.

subtasks.name: Product Catalog Audit
subtasks.description: Audit current product catalog and identify all standard prelam and laminate specifications suitable for 26" Flexo
subtasks.completion_criteria: Complete product specification matrix identifying SKUs compatible with 26" Flexo format; artwork preparation requirements documented; volume analysis for Flexo-eligible products
subtasks.dependencies: Current product master list; historical volume data by SKU
subtasks.success_metric: 100% of standard products evaluated; minimum 50 SKUs identified as Flexo-eligible with volume justification

subtasks.name: Press Configuration & Print Trials
subtasks.description: Work with Dazpak to configure 26" Flexo press for Calyx product specifications and conduct print trials
subtasks.completion_criteria: Dazpak press configured with Calyx-specific setups; print trials completed on minimum 10 high-volume SKUs; quality approval samples retained
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 6.1; Dazpak press availability for trials
subtasks.success_metric: 10+ SKUs approved through print trials; color match within acceptable delta-E; print registration within spec

subtasks.name: Quoting & Ordering Workflow
subtasks.description: Establish quoting and ordering workflow for 26" Flexo products and integrate into standard procurement process
subtasks.completion_criteria: Dazpak pricing matrix for all approved SKUs finalized; ordering process documented in SOP; first production orders placed and received
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 6.2; pricing agreement with Dazpak
subtasks.success_metric: Quoting turnaround under 24 hours; minimum 5 production orders completed by end of Q1; lead time 20%+ faster than current alternatives

name: Brand My Bags Vendor Evaluation
description: Vet Brand My Bags as potential External Vendor. Explore the feasibility of using Brand My Bags as a mid web digital print partner to provide lower outsourced pricing for sizes too big to print internally.

subtasks.name: Vendor Qualification
subtasks.description: Conduct initial vendor qualification including capabilities assessment, pricing review, and reference checks
subtasks.completion_criteria: Completed vendor qualification checklist; pricing comparison vs. current vendors for 5 benchmark products; minimum 2 customer references contacted and documented
subtasks.dependencies: Brand My Bags sales contact engagement; current vendor pricing data for comparison
subtasks.success_metric: Vendor capabilities confirmed for target product sizes; pricing at minimum 10% below current alternatives; positive references obtained

subtasks.name: Sample Order & Quality Validation
subtasks.description: Execute sample order and quality validation for representative product range
subtasks.completion_criteria: Sample orders placed for minimum 5 SKU types representing size/complexity range; quality inspection completed; samples reviewed by Sales for customer acceptability
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 7.1 with positive outcome; sample order agreement with Brand My Bags
subtasks.success_metric: Quality acceptance rate 95%+; Sales team approval for customer-facing use; lead time meets or beats current vendors

subtasks.name: Go/No-Go Decision & Onboarding
subtasks.description: Make go/no-go decision and onboard Brand My Bags as approved vendor if validated
subtasks.completion_criteria: Formal vendor evaluation report with recommendation; if approved: vendor agreement signed, onboarded into procurement system, first production orders placed
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtask 7.2; management alignment on vendor strategy
subtasks.success_metric: Decision documented with supporting data; if approved: minimum 10,000 MSI ordered by end of Q1 with cost savings tracking initiated

name: Alternative CR Zipper Implementation
description: Implement alternative CR Zipper setup with External Vendors. After internal validation of alternative CR zipper we must implement this zipper with our existing flexible packaging converters to ensure pricing consistency across network.

subtasks.name: Legal Patent Review
subtasks.description: Complete legal review to ensure there is no patent infringement on alternative CR zipper design
subtasks.completion_criteria: Legal opinion letter received confirming no patent infringement risk; documented review of relevant patents and freedom-to-operate analysis
subtasks.dependencies: Alternative CR zipper specifications and sourcing details; patent search results
subtasks.success_metric: Clear legal opinion obtained; zero identified patent conflicts; documented approval to proceed with implementation

subtasks.name: Final Design Validation
subtasks.description: Complete final design validation internally with production testing and customer acceptance criteria
subtasks.completion_criteria: Design finalized with engineering approval; production trials completed on minimum 3 product SKUs; customer feedback obtained on samples (minimum 3 key accounts)
subtasks.dependencies: Subtask 8.1 in progress with no red flags; sample zipper material available
subtasks.success_metric: Design approved for production; customer acceptance rate 90%+; no functional defects in testing

subtasks.name: Dazpak Training
subtasks.description: Train Dazpak on new alternative CR zipper application process and validate their production capability
subtasks.completion_criteria: Training session completed with Dazpak production team; process documentation provided; pilot production run completed with quality validation
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtasks 8.1 and 8.2; Dazpak availability for training
subtasks.success_metric: Dazpak team certified on process; pilot run quality within spec; pricing confirmed consistent with internal production

subtasks.name: Ross Training
subtasks.description: Train Ross on new alternative CR zipper application process and validate their production capability
subtasks.completion_criteria: Training session completed with Ross production team; process documentation provided; pilot production run completed with quality validation
subtasks.dependencies: Completion of Subtasks 8.1 and 8.2; Ross availability for training
subtasks.success_metric: Ross team certified on process; pilot run quality within spec; network-wide pricing consistency confirmed
